title: Poster, 1997-19-279, ca. 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted upper right corner: red maple leaf inscribed in circle logo. Imprinted in white at lower right corner: Printed in U.S.A.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description:
Against a purple background, a color photographic image of a lit geodesic dome at evening. Inside, people are seen. The entry ramps are rendered in purple and blue tones. The image juts into the poster design creating a right angle.
At left center in large white letters above left edge of image reads 'Toronto', and at upper left 'Air Canada's' is placed at an oblique angle.
